thread.title: Honor of Kings Surpasses IDR 16.2 Trillion in 2024 Revenue, Setting New Profit Milestone
thread.title_full: Honor of Kings Surpasses IDR 16.2 Trillion in 2024 Revenue, Setting New Profit Milestone

author: world today news
title: Honor of Kings Surpasses IDR 16.2 Trillion in 2024 Revenue, Setting New Profit Milestone
text:
Jakarta – ‍ Honor of ‍Kings has set a record as ​the ‍mobile game with the highest revenue in 2024, generating more than USD 1 billion or ‌around IDR 16.2 ⁢trillion. This ‍achievement marks their third consecutive record since 2022, solidifying their position as the most popular Android adn iOS game globally. The ‍report, sourced from ​the⁣ mobile application ‍analytics platform, App Magic, ranks Honor⁢ of Kings second as the mobile application with ‌the highest revenue after TikTok, as​ reported ⁤by detikINET on ​Thursday (9/1/2024).
The success of‌ Honor‌ of Kings is attributed to the enthusiasm of players‍ for the game’s cosmetic content, including hero skins, ‍recall effects, and exclusive collaboration content. Throughout 2024,the game has collaborated with well-known IPs such⁣ as‌ Saint Seiya,Hello Kitty,and Jujutsu​ Kaisen. ⁤These collaborations have spawned high-quality​ items, including iconic characters like Yuji Itadori and ⁢Gojo Satoru.
The game’s supremacy is not⁣ solely based on income ⁣but also on the gaming experience ‌provided by the developer. The game mechanism has captivated gamers, earning it the title of Best Game at the 2024 Google Play Awards for ⁣the ⁢Southeast Asia​ region.
Besides Honor of Kings , six other mobile games​ have generated revenues of more than USD 1 billion or ⁤around IDR 16.2 ⁢trillion. These games include Monopoly ⁣Go!, Royal Match, Roblox,‍ PUBG Mobile, Last War: ⁢Survival, and Candy Crush Saga. Other ‌notable mobile games include Whiteout ⁢Survival, Tencent mobile Games, and Coin Master, which have earned income of more than USD 500 million or around⁣ IDR 8.1 trillion.
Table: ​Key ⁣Achievements​ of Honor⁢ of Kings
| ‌ Achievement | Details |
| –|————-|
| Revenue | USD 1‍ billion (IDR 16.2 trillion) |
| Rank | Second ⁢highest revenue after TikTok |
| Collaborations | Saint Seiya, Hello kitty, Jujutsu ⁢Kaisen‍ |
| Awards | best Game at 2024 Google Play Awards |
The success of Honor of Kings is a ‌testament to the​ game’s ability ‍to captivate players and generate ample revenue. The game’s collaborations and high-quality items ‍have contributed to its continued success, making it a standout in‍ the mobile⁣ gaming industry.
